content: while you re here please check out my patterns of the week and save 50% off and more http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials a handy bag keeper that is quick and easy to make in any length **materials and measurements** yarn worsted weight acrylic sample red heart super saver crochet hook i miscellaneous yarn needle to weave in ends gauge not necessary for this project size measured flat 10″ tall or desired length x 5″ wide skill level beginner with basic crochet skills ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ please follow snappy tots online for free patterns giveaways and new releases facebook 2 pinterest 3 blog 4 twitter 5 please contact the designer with any questions comments or concerns help with this pattern is available through email heidi@snappy-tots com all text and graphics/photos are copyright ©2015 snappy tots by heidi yates all rights reserved no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to www snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 1 http //snappy-tots com/scrubbies-week-23/ 2 http //www facebook com/snappytots 3 http //www pinterest com/snappytots 4 http //snappy-tots com 5 http //www twitter com/snappytots
